= Introduction =

This details the values in the sunteams.properties file

== Supplied Values ==
{{{
PORT = COM1
DAILYFILE = c:\temp
SystemId = 
APIKey = 
URL =  http://pvoutput.org/service/r1/addstatus.jsp
cUrl = c:\curl\curl.exe
}}}
*PORT* - This is the serial port the logger should connect to.<br>
*DAILYFILE* - The location to create the daily file with every sample taken.<br>
*SystemId* - You system id<br>
*APIkey* - You API Key<br>
*URL* - The url that accepts the live updates<br>
*cUrl* - The location of the curl executable<br>
*mode* - The type of instantanious power to record
  peak -> peak power for last 10 minutes<br>
  avg -> average power for last 10 minutes<br>
  act -> actual power when the 10 minute sample was take<br>
